author: mariohavel
content: First step would be diving into the area, learning about underlying infrastructure and current solutions, then submitting your dev update about it. Check the program guides here https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/tree/master/program-guide

author: kanagwa
content: Hi, I have a question regarding notation on EIPs. I saw the use of the `//` symbol on math formulas, and was not sure what's the interpretation

author: kanagwa

author: chfast
content: I'm also collecting EVM benchmarks ideas in https://github.com/ipsilon/evm-benchmarks. If someone wants a short break you can convert an idea into a proper benchmark.
